Orientation at JCU is packed with essential information and fun activities to help you get familiar with the campus, meet new friends, and learn about student support services.

Orientation week is designed to help new students get familiar with campus, meet peers, and learn about available support services. Your attendance at orientation is important to start your university journey smoothly!

patterns: Who will give the welcome speech?
What happens in the welcome speech?
responses: The welcome speech for part-time students is on 16 January 2025, from 07:00 PM to 07:25 PM at Block C. It will be delivered by the Deputy Vice-Chancellor and Acting Campus Dean.
For full-time students, the welcome speech is on 16 January 2025, from 09:00 AM to 09:10 AM at Block C.

patterns: Who will conduct the academic briefing?
responses: For part-time students, academic advising takes place on 16 January 2025, from 07:25 PM to 08:30 PM. It will be conducted by Associate Professors and Academic Heads based on your course.
For full-time students, academic advising is on 16 January 2025, from 10:40 AM to 11:40 AM in breakout rooms.

patterns: What do I need for DigiLearn?
responses: DigiLearn is JCU's virtual learning environment. You must complete JCU GetStarted before attending the DigiLearn Workshops.
Make sure to use a laptop or personal computer for DigiLearn workshops. Mobile phones and iPads are not recommended.

patterns: What documents do I need for my student pass?
Where do I go for my student pass appointment?
responses: International students need to complete Student's Pass formalities. Arrive in Singapore at least two weeks before classes start to avoid delays.
The required documents for the Student’s Pass include your passport and IPA letter. The formalities take place at Block C on 6-7 January 2025 from 09:00 AM to 03:00 PM.

patterns: What booths are available at orientation?
Can I meet staff at orientation?
What kind of support services are at JCU?
responses: You can visit booths to learn about academic support, career development, student well-being, and campus life. JCU partners for accommodation and telecommunication services will also be there!
Meet JCU staff and explore available support services during orientation. Don’t forget to grab your welcome bag and JCU T-shirt!

patterns: How can I explore the campus?
Where do I register for campus exploration?
responses: Campus exploration is on 14 January 2025 from 02:00 PM to 05:30 PM. Register by 3 January 2025 to join.
The event includes campus exploration and fun activities. Register through the official JCU link sent to your email.
